description: Part single, part two storey rear extension, part single storey side extension (following demolition of existing), garage conversion, window replacements, erection of patio (with privacy screen) and associated steps.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Elevation, Proposed Floor Plans drawing no.PL-02 Rev D and Windows, Section and Elevation details drawing no.PL-02 Rev C
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be consistent with those listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.22) policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 3.8 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No new openings to the extension hereby approved shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.22) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.10 of Ealing's Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
| The proposed flank, first floor windows, facing nos.10 Audley Road shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level and remain in perpetuity.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2021), policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.22) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
